# Cluster Extension Submodule

<!-- markdownlint-disable MD033 -->
## Requirements

The following requirements are needed by this module:

- <a name="requirement_terraform"></a> [terraform](#requirement\_terraform) (~> 1.12)

- <a name="requirement_azurerm"></a> [azurerm](#requirement\_azurerm) (~> 4.46)

## Resources

The following resources are used by this module:

- [azurerm_kubernetes_cluster_extension.this](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/hashicorp/azurerm/latest/docs/resources/kubernetes_cluster_extension) (resource)

<!-- markdownlint-disable MD013 -->
## Required Inputs

The following input variables are required:

### <a name="input_cluster_id"></a> [cluster\_id](#input\_cluster\_id)

Description: The ID of the Kubernetes cluster.

Type: `string`

### <a name="input_extension_type"></a> [extension\_type](#input\_extension\_type)

Description: The extension type. Examples: 'microsoft.dapr', 'microsoft.azureappconfiguration', 'microsoft.storagepoolextension'.

Type: `string`

### <a name="input_name"></a> [name](#input\_name)

Description: The name of the cluster extension.

Type: `string`

## Optional Inputs

The following input variables are optional (have default values):

### <a name="input_configuration_protected_settings"></a> [configuration\_protected\_settings](#input\_configuration\_protected\_settings)

Description: Configuration settings that are protected or sensitive for the extension.

Type: `map(string)`

Default: `{}`

### <a name="input_configuration_settings"></a> [configuration\_settings](#input\_configuration\_settings)

Description: Configuration settings for the extension.

Type: `map(string)`

Default: `{}`

### <a name="input_extension_version"></a> [extension\_version](#input\_extension\_version)

Description: User-specified version that the extension should pin to. If not set, Azure uses the latest version and auto-upgrades.

Type: `string`

Default: `null`

### <a name="input_plan"></a> [plan](#input\_plan)

Description: Plan block for marketplace extensions.

Type:

```hcl
object({
    name           = string
    product        = string
    publisher      = string
    promotion_code = optional(string)
    version        = optional(string)
  })
```

Default: `null`

### <a name="input_release_namespace"></a> [release\_namespace](#input\_release\_namespace)

Description: Namespace where the extension release must be placed for a cluster scoped extension.

Type: `string`

Default: `null`

### <a name="input_release_train"></a> [release\_train](#input\_release\_train)

Description: The release train used by this extension. Possible values include but are not limited to 'Stable' or 'Preview'.

Type: `string`

Default: `null`

### <a name="input_target_namespace"></a> [target\_namespace](#input\_target\_namespace)

Description: Namespace where the extension will be created for a namespace scoped extension.

Type: `string`

Default: `null`

### <a name="input_timeouts"></a> [timeouts](#input\_timeouts)

Description: Timeouts for create, read, update, and delete operations.

Type:

```hcl
object({
    create = optional(string)
    read   = optional(string)
    update = optional(string)
    delete = optional(string)
  })
```

Default: `null`

## Outputs

The following outputs are exported:

### <a name="output_name"></a> [name](#output\_name)

Description: The name of the created cluster extension.

### <a name="output_resource_id"></a> [resource\_id](#output\_resource\_id)

Description: The ID of the created cluster extension.

## Modules

No modules.

## Data Collection

The software may collect information about you and your use of the software and send it to Microsoft. Microsoft may use this information to provide services and improve our products and services. You may turn off the telemetry as described in the repository. There are also some features in the software that may enable you and Microsoft to collect data from users of your applications. If you use these features, you must comply with applicable law, including providing appropriate notices to users of your applications together with a copy of Microsoft's privacy statement. Our privacy statement is located at <https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=824704>. You can learn more about data collection and use in the help documentation and our privacy statement. Your use of the software operates as your consent to these practices.
